sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table simple_my_friends ( id bigint not null, userid bigint not null, createdate datetime not null, friendid bigint not null, groupid bigint, relation tinyint not null, primary key(id), unique (userid, friendid) );

create table simple_my_friends_group ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, text varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid bigint not null, friends int not null, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (userid, text) );

create table simple_my_friends_request ( id bigint not null, sentid bigint not null, sentdate datetime not null, toid bigint not null, messagetext varchar(256), requeststatus tinyint not null, groupid bigint, primary key(id) );

create table simple_my_folder ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, text varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint not null, files int, filessize bigint, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (parentid, text, userid) );

create table simple_my_file ( id bigint not null, catalogid bigint not null, topic varchar(128), filename varchar(80) not null, filetype varchar(16), filesize bigint not null, downloads bigint not null, md5 varchar(32), sha1 varchar(40), ip varchar(32), description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint not null, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, ttop bit, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_my_file_stat ( id bigint not null, filesizelimit bigint, fileuploadlimit bigint, allfiles int, allfilessize bigint, rootfiles int, rootfilessize bigint, deletefiles int, deletefilessize bigint, primary key(id) );

create table simple_my_message ( id bigint not null, messagetype tinyint not null, notification tinyint, subject varchar(80), textbody varchar(256) not null, sentid bigint, sentdate datetime not null, toid bigint, jobview varchar(32), messageurl varchar(80), expireddate datetime, messageread bit, status tinyint, primary key(id) );

create table simple_my_home_tabs ( id bigint not null, tabtext varchar(32) not null, userid bigint not null, createdate datetime not null, defaulttab bit not null, views int not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(userid, tabtext) );
create table simple_my_space_stat ( id bigint not null, views bigint not null, attentions int not null, fans int not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_my_space_log ( id bigint not null, userid bigint not null, createdate datetime not null, content varchar(256), refmodule tinyint, refid bigint, replyfrom bigint, remarks int not null, primary key(id) );
create table simple_my_space_remark ( id bigint not null, logid bigint not null, userid bigint not null, createdate datetime not null, content varchar(256), primary key(id) );
create table simple_my_space_resource ( id bigint not null, logid bigint not null, logresource tinyint not null, resourceid bigint, resourceurl varchar(128), primary key(id) );
